      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

            <entry>cahi1:data_d46beb6542bef4bbdf17e4239ac7cfcfce5566d9</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy conversion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energiekonvertierung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conversion d'énergie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conversão da energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conversione di energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενεργειακή μετατροπή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conversión de la energía</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This flowchart shows how the potential energy of the book is converted into kinetic energy during the fall and finally, into thermal and sound energy as it hits the floor.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy conversion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">falling object</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potential energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Flußdiagramm zeigt, wie die mögliche 
Energie des Buches in kinetische Energie während des Falles und 
schließlich umgewandelt wird, in thermische und stichhaltige Energie,
während es den Fußboden schlägt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet organigramme montre comment l'énergie 
potentielle du livre est convertie en énergie cinétique pendant la 
chute et en conclusion, dans l'énergie thermique et saine pendant 
qu'il frappe le plancher.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este fluxograma mostra como a energia potencial 
do livro é convertida na energia cinética durante a queda e 
finalmente, na energia térmica e sadia enquanto bate o assoalho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo diagramma di flusso mostra come l'energia 
potenziale del libro è convertita in energia cinetica durante la 
caduta e per concludere, in energia termica e sana mentre colpisce il 
pavimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα ροής επιδεικνύει πώς η πιθανή 
ενέργεια του βιβλίου μετατρέπεται στην κινητική ενέργεια κατά τη
διάρκεια της πτώσης και τελικά, στη θερμική και υγιή ενέργεια 
δεδομένου ότι χτυπά το πάτωμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este organigrama muestra cómo la energía 
potencial del libro se convierte en energía cinética durante la 
caída y finalmente, en energía termal y sana mientras que golpea el 
suelo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energiekonvertierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fallende Nachricht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kinetische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">mögliche Energie</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">stichhaltige Energie</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
